Package com.camerontec.catalys.server.ha.communications

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IChannel
    Interface to be implemented by classes capable of providing communications with other members of an HA group.
    IChannelFactory
    Interface to be implemented by classes capable of providing HA communications channels for use by the application.
    IChannelListener
    Message listener callback interface.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ChannelMessage
    Class implementing a message structure for all messages sent to and received from IChannel implementations.
    ChannelMessageMultiplexer
    An instance of this class is used to perform message type based multiplexing on top of a single IChannel.
    HABufferFactory
    Factory to be used for creating buffers container data to be sent or received via the HAMessagingSystem.
    SocketEndpoint
    Class representing one end of a point to point HA communications channel.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    MessageType
    HA communications subsystem message types.
    Topic
    Logical communications topics for the HA subsystem.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ChannelException
    General channel exception class.
